page.title: 08CLUBS IN OUR STUDY AREA
page.content: There are lots of clubs in Horrabridge .There are Brownies, Guides, Cubs,Scouts,Sunday School and Badminton. I go to Badminton,Brownies and Sunday School. At Badminton some coaches teach us to play.Soon I will be going to the Tuesday group.At 10 years old I am the oldest at Badminton (not including the teachers) Sunday School is where we learn about God and Jesus.We sing hymns and choruses.I go in the morning after there has been a service.My sister goes to choir before that. Brownies is a club for girls.The boys have a similar club called Cubs .We make things and help people.We have concerts as well.We have just had one in July.
